caption.p: Observed (red crosses) and calculated profiles (full black line) for Sr 0.9Ba 0.1Co 0.95Ru 0.05O 3−δ perovskite after Rietveld refinement of the crystal structure in a standard perovskite model in the Pm-3m space group, with unit-cell parameter of a = 3.9159(5) Å. The difference plot (full blue line) and allowed Bragg reflections (green vertical lines) are also shown.
